definitions: To write or engrave words or symbols on something, especially as a formal or lasting record.
To enter (a name or item) on a list or in a book.
To draw (one figure) within another so that points of the inner figure lie on the boundary of the outer figure.
examples: They will inscribe his name on the trophy.
The book was inscribed with a personal message.
He inscribed his name in the register.
A circle can be inscribed in a square.
